resources.string: Check for human start. Uncheck for AI start.

"Gomoku is a 2-players game played on a square grid. On a player's turn, corresponding sign (an 'X' or an 'O') is put into a square. A player wins the game when an unbroken row (horizontally, vertically or diagonally) of 5 signs is reached.

Press once to play a move and second time to the same square to confirm it.

This game is currently under development and any feedback is welcome!"
